PRESENTATION.title: Be our guest in Clos Gouzilh !
PRESENTATION.text1: This house full of character is situated in Saint-Aigulin at the extreme east corner of the department of the Charente-Maritime, in High Saintonge, gateway to Périgord, Gironde and Charente – ideal starting point to discover in one or several days regions marked by a large cultural -  archaeologically, historically and gastronomic - heritage.
PRESENTATION.text2: In the evening, you’ll relax in our guesthouse and dream about other nice discoveries. If you wish it, your hosts Brigitte and Pascal may prepare you a gourmet plate with regional products.

ROOMS.RoomInfo.title: Useful information
ROOMS.RoomInfo5: Our guest house is not suitable for people with reduced mobility
ROOMS.RoomInfo6: For the general satisfaction and tranquillity of our guests, our friends, the pets are not allowed
ROOMS.RoomInfo7: Cash on arrival or bank transfer before arrival

ACTIVITIES.title:
Discover the charm, liveliness and openness of the Charente-Maritime and its neighbouring departments.

At the right time, at the right place !

CONTACT.InfoMail: Do you want to receive information?
